course.title: Quantum Devices
course.description: Electronic structure of crystals. Semiconductor heterostructures: bandstructure engineering. Low-dimensional solids: quantum wells, wires and dots; superlattices; 2D electron gas; carbon nanotubes, nanowires, graphene. Tunneling and resonant tunneling, superlattice transport. Quantum point contacts. Interband and intersubband optical transistions. Quantum confined Stark effect. Device concepts (diodes, transistors, lasers). Quantum well lasers, modulators and detectors. Resonant tunneling devices. Quantum cascade lasers.
course.prerequisites: Undergraduate level quantum mechanics such as Physics 143a or equivalent.
